article_title: Netanyahu defends Gaza war as protesters rally outside US Congress
sentence: The  prime  minister's  address  to  Congress  came  nine  months  into  Israel's  campaign  in  Gaza,  which  has  killed  more  than  39,000  people,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Netanyahu defends Gaza war as protesters rally outside US Congress
sentence: The  Israeli  military  launched  a  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  an  unprecedented  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  others  were  taken  hostage.
